name: bloom-conductor-workspace
description: Bloom Nucleus Workspace - Installer and Launcher

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix launcher && npm install --prefix setup
scripts.build:all: npm run build:launcher && npm run build:setup
scripts.version:all: npm run version:launcher && npm run version:setup
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf launcher/node_modules setup/node_modules
